extracted_text:
According to corporate announcements published on August 25, 2025, by TITAN Ltd on the stock exchanges and its website, the company had two significant updates .

New Director Appointment:The company announced the appointment of Puneet Chhatwal as an Additional Director, effective August 28, 2025. Chhatwal was nominated by co-promoter Tata Sons. He is also the Managing Director and CEO of the Indian Hotels Company Ltd (IHCL).

Commercial Paper Repayment:TITAN also provided an intimation to the exchanges regarding the redemption of a commercial paper.
